title: EU Parliament to hold special plenary on Ukraine war anniversary
summary_full: A debate on Russia's war in Ukraine and a vote on a new €90 billion defence-focused loan to Ukraine have also been moved to 24 February
summary_public: A debate on Russia's war in Ukraine and a vote on a new €90 billion defence-focused loan to Ukraine have also been moved to 24 February
